| HistoryText             = The Board of Governors oversaw the [[Alpha Flight (Space Program) (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight Space Program]]. It was composed of representatives of nations of the [[Earth]] and worlds supporting Alpha Flight or with shared security interests.{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 9 6}}

The Board of Governors was disbanded after it was revealed that Canadian representative [[Eshu (Earth-616)|Philippe Beaulieu]] was actually the villain [[Eshu]] in disguise, to prevent it from being compromised again.{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 9 10}}
